mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO `project_website`(`project_gid`,`website_type`,`link_url`,`create_time`,`update_time`) VALUES (#{projectGid}, 'gitHub', #{gitHub}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'twitter', #{twitter}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'facebook', #{facebook}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'telegram', #{telegram}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'reddit', #{reddit}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'officialLink', #{officialLink}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'biYong', #{biYong}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'kyc', #{kyc}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'tokenTerms', #{tokenTerms}, now(), now()), (#{projectGid}, 'privacyPolicy', #{privacyPolicy}, now(), now()) ;
